#SOTU Trivia: George Washington delivered the shortest State of the Union Address with just 1,089 words.
#SOTU Trivia: Bill Clinton delivered the longest State of the Union Address lasting about an hour and a half.
#SOTU Trivia: Most State of the Union speeches go through at least 20 drafts.
#SOTU Trivia: Designated Survivor IS real! Every year, the chief of staff selects a cabinet secretary to be surrounded by secret service agents in a remote location should catastrophe strike.

#SOTU Trivia: In 1913, Woodrow Wilson re-established the practice of delivering the address in person. Prior to that, the address was often written and sent to Congress.
